text: The men's hammer throw event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 23 and 24 August. A 7257g (senior implement) hammer was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Maciej Pałyszko ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Vadim ==Participation== According to an unofficial count, 27 athletes from 21 countries participated in the event. ==References== Hammer throw Category:Hammer throw at the World Athletics U20 Championships
